item.title: Coding Help (Can Anyone Help?) & Cleint
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

If (command.equalsignoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, ####); sendMessage("Starter Packet :D"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); saverchar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("No nubcake"); } }

That can be -

If (command.equalsignoreCase("starter") && starter == 0) { addItem(995, ####); sendMessage("Starter Packet :D"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); saverchar(); else sendMessage("No nubcake"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Coding Help (Can Anyone Help?) & Cleint
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

Let’s say your client is “Almost” like mine, search for the folder containing the map “Sprites” in that folder you sould see your client picture, just copy name and replace that image whit your picture,

If you want to change name on your document it will most likely be in

Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1

Go there and search for the image name

/ idk if this will work on your client thou, some of em is really diffrent :S

Good luck

And when i think about it it should be;

If (command.equalsignoreCase("starter")) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, ####);
sendMessage("Starter Packet :D");
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
saverchar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage("No nubcake");
}
}

Sorry if i spelled something wrong im really tierd and I don't got anny of my files to copy on this computer.. 

Good luck :)

Read full topic

@freeky wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:280398”]Just change the image in your client to your own.

For the commands, specify what type of commands you want.[/quote]

well erm first if anyone is willing just asking if not i guess il have to do it myself if no one is gonna do it for me anyway thats good cuz i learn.

Anyway i was gonna ask if anyone could help me code it through team viewer cuz i dont really wanna do it like on the forum.

and for the cleint i did try replacing it with my own and this is what i got :

Sorry, an error occured while trying to load Runescape

to fix this trying the following (in order):

1.Trying closing all web browser windows, and reloading
2.try claering you web browser cache from tools internet options
3.try using a diffrent game world
4.try rebooting your computer
5.try selecting a diffrent version of java from the play game menu

and yes i did compile it i also replaced it in this location:

pwnscape cleint/files/spirts

Ok thats done now with my server.

I am not really good at coding and i know i have posted alot of threads about this and i just wanna make another thread cuz my old one keeps moving to the next page.

Ok here it is.I am not good at coding and i can only make simple commands such as item commands such as :

}
if (command.startsWith(“starter”) && playerRights) > 0{
additem(6570, 1);
}

so yea i only know how to do a simple code like that if anyone is willing to help a noob coder they will be rewared is some way thanks
